description: Public Works and Government Services Canada has a requirement for the supply and installation of new condensing boilers...
full_summary:
> **Invitation to Tender: Condensing Boiler Replacement**
> _______________________________________________________
> **Tender Details**
> _______________________________________________________
> 
> - **Tender Reference:** WS4344769828
> - **Government Contract Number:** PSPC WS4344769828
> - **Procurement Method:** Competitive Bidding
> - **Tender Closing Date:** February 5, 2024, 14:00:00 (North American Eastern Time)
> - **Estimated Contract Start Date:** January 30, 2024
> 
> **Project Description**
> _______________________________________________________
> 
> Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking contractors to supply and install new condensing boilers at the Fredericton Research and Development Centre, located at 850 Lincoln Road, York County, New Brunswick.
> 
> **Scope of Work**
> _______________________________________________________
> 
> The successful contractor must perform and complete the work within 18 weeks of award notification. The work includes furnishing all plant, labor, equipment, and materials necessary to complete the project.
> 
> **Accommodations for Diverse Suppliers**
> _______________________________________________________
> 
> Public Works and Government Services Canada is an equal opportunities institution and is committed to providing reasonable accommodations to qualified suppliers, including those with disabilities.
> 
> **How to Obtain the Tender Documents**
> _______________________________________________________
> 
> Interested contractors must submit a request in writing to Richard Parsons, Contracting Authority, at richard.parsons@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca, including their name, company name, and project number. Tenders must be submitted in accordance with the tender documents and conform to the specifications stated in Section II, Tendering Information.
> 
>
